question: Which system are the brain and spinal cord apart of?

nodes.text: The large nervous system includes the brain and spinal cord.
The cerebral cortex is part of the system comprised of the brain and spinal cord.
The limbic system includes the brain and spinal cord.
The central nervous system comprises the brain and spinal cord.
